summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of the alley between Block 1 and Block 2, Carleton Park Terrace-Second Division Addition, being the alley between 35th Ave. West and 36th Ave. West from West Armour Street to West Ray Street, and a certain other street and alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6267, and appropriating money from the Water Fund in aid thereof.
